content:
CSS-framework

Compact and user-friendly CSS-framework with a capacity of less then 50KB allows you to realize the basic needs of adaptive blocks-like layout of modern web-pages. We propagate the principle "Less DOM-objects - maximum performance," and we are also close to the spirit of the DRY principle.

Compatibility with IE9 + browsers

CSS-framework

It is an easy and understandable PHP code that allows you to deploy scalable web-projects (especially portals). The box version contains a sufficient set of modules to create a business-card or Internet-store. Our template maker simplify the life of the layout-developers.

Compatibility with PHP 5.4+

JavaScript-framework

JavaScript library to work on most Front-End tasks. We have produced a several modules: WYSIWYG editor, image carousel, modal windows, tabs, calendar (date-picker), file downloader, ratings, Ajax-editing blocks, etc.

Compatibility with IE9 + browsers
